languages.text: {n}Плавные, еле уловимые движения ксеноса не похожи на грубые выпады друкари или осторожные жесты детей Азуриана. Однако головная боль и остатки морока мешают вам сфокусировать взгляд и рассмотреть смельчака, что столь дерзко прервал речь архонта. Ксенос ловит ваш взгляд и чуть кивает. Глубокие тени на его маске на мгновение будто бы складываются в ехидную улыбку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Плавные, еле уловимые движения ксеноса не похожи на грубые выпады друкари или осторожные жесты детей Азуриана. Однако головная боль и остатки морока мешают вам сфокусировать взгляд и рассмотреть смельчака, что столь дерзко прервал речь архонта. Ксенос ловит ваш взгляд и чуть кивает. Глубокие тени на его маске на мгновение будто бы складываются в ехидную улыбку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Плавные, еле уловимые движения ксеноса не похожи на грубые выпады друкари или осторожные жесты детей Азуриана. Однако головная боль и остатки морока мешают вам сфокусировать взгляд и рассмотреть смельчака, что столь дерзко прервал речь архонта. Ксенос ловит ваш взгляд и чуть кивает. Глубокие тени на его маске на мгновение будто бы складываются в ехидную улыбку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari of the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but the headache and the lingering spell prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daredevil who interrupted the archon so boldly. The xenos catches your gaze and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous smirk.{/n}

{n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari of the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but the headache and the lingering spell prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daredevil who interrupted the archon so boldly. The xenos catches your gaze and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous smirk.{/n}

The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

{n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

{n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位异形的动作流畅而优雅，既不同于黑暗灵族粗暴的做派，也不同于阿苏焉之子谨慎的风格。但你的头疼得很厉害，脑中的疑惑挥之不去，这让你无法将目光集中在打断执政官谈话的大胆异形身上。这位异形似乎注意到了你的目光，朝你点了点头。有那么一瞬间，面具上的阴影似乎扭曲了面具的表情，露出了恶作剧般的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位异形的动作流畅而优雅，既不同于黑暗灵族粗暴的做派，也不同于阿苏焉之子谨慎的风格。但你的头疼得很厉害，脑中的疑惑挥之不去，这让你无法将目光集中在打断执政官谈话的大胆异形身上。这位异形似乎注意到了你的目光，朝你点了点头。有那么一瞬间，面具上的阴影似乎扭曲了面具的表情，露出了恶作剧般的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: {n}異種族の滑らかで繊細な動きは、デュカーリの荒々しい突進やアシュリアンの御子らの慎重な身振りとは異なるが、頭痛と長引く意識の解離のせいで、アーコンの邪魔をした大胆な人物を直視することができない。異種族はこちらの視線に気づき、うなずいた。一瞬、仮面の影がいたずらっぽい笑いを浮かべているように見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族の滑らかで繊細な動きは、デュカーリの荒々しい突進やアシュリアンの御子らの慎重な身振りとは異なるが、頭痛と長引く意識の解離のせいで、アーコンの邪魔をした大胆な人物を直視することができない。異種族はこちらの視線に気づき、うなずいた。一瞬、仮面の影がいたずらっぽい笑いを浮かべているように見えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los movimientos fluidos y sutiles de este xenos no se parecen en nada a las zancadas poderosas de los Drukhari ni a los gestos cautelosos de los Hijos de Asuryan, pero tu cabeza dolorida y el estado de tu memoria te impiden fijar la mirada en el valiente que acaba de interrumpir al Arconte. El xenos capta tu mirada y asiente. Por un momento, las sombras de la máscara parecen convertir su expresión en una sonrisa traviesa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los movimientos fluidos y sutiles de este xenos no se parecen en nada a las zancadas poderosas de los Drukhari ni a los gestos cautelosos de los Hijos de Asuryan, pero tu cabeza dolorida y el estado de tu memoria te impiden fijar la mirada en el valiente que acaba de interrumpir al Arconte. El xenos capta tu mirada y asiente. Por un momento, las sombras de la máscara parecen convertir su expresión en una sonrisa traviesa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les gestes subtils et délicats de ce xénos n'ont rien à voir avec les mouvements brusques des Drukharis ou les postures prudentes des enfants d'Asuryan, mais votre tête encore douloureuse vous empêche de concentrer votre regard sur l'effronté qui a osé interrompre l'archonte. Le xénos croise votre regard et hoche la tête. L'espace d'un instant, le jeu des ombres sur son masque forme comme un sourire malicieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gestes subtils et délicats de ce xénos n'ont rien à voir avec les mouvements brusques des Drukharis ou les postures prudentes des enfants d'Asuryan, mais votre tête encore douloureuse vous empêche de concentrer votre regard sur l'effronté qui a osé interrompre l'archonte. Le xénos croise votre regard et hoche la tête. L'espace d'un instant, le jeu des ombres sur son masque forme comme un sourire malicieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die sanften, subtilen Bewegungen dieses Xenos haben wenig gemein mit dem groben Vorstoßen der Drukhari oder den vorsichtigen Gesten der Kinder von Asuryan, aber deine Kopfschmerzen und die nachhallende Fuge verhindern, dass du deinen Blick auf die mutige Gestalt konzentrieren kannst, die den Archon unterbrochen hat. Der Xenos begegnet deinem Blick und nickt. Für einen Augenblick scheinen die Schatten auf der Maske ein boshaftes Grinsen zu formen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die sanften, subtilen Bewegungen dieses Xenos haben wenig gemein mit dem groben Vorstoßen der Drukhari oder den vorsichtigen Gesten der Kinder von Asuryan, aber deine Kopfschmerzen und die nachhallende Fuge verhindern, dass du deinen Blick auf die mutige Gestalt konzentrieren kannst, die den Archon unterbrochen hat. Der Xenos begegnet deinem Blick und nickt. Für einen Augenblick scheinen die Schatten auf der Maske ein boshaftes Grinsen zu formen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zenonun akıcı ve ince hareketleri, ne Drukhari'nin keskin ve saldırgan tavırlarını ne de Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın temkinli duruşlarını andırıyor. Bir yandan ağrıyan başın ve amnezinin yan etkileri ise Arkon'un eylemlerini bölen bu cüretkâr varlığa odaklanmanı engelliyor. Zeno, bakışlarına karşılık verip seni başıyla selamlıyor. Üzerindeki gölgeler, bir anlığına maskenin ifadesini bozarak haylaz bir gülüş ortaya çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The smooth, subtle movements of this xenos are unlike the rough lunges of the Drukhari or the cautious gestures of the Children of Asuryan, but your aching head and the lingering fugue prevent you from focusing your eyes on the daring soul who interrupted the Archon. The xenos catches your eye and nods. For a moment, the play of shadows on the mask appears to twist its expression into a mischievous grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zenonun akıcı ve ince hareketleri ne Drukhari'nin keskin ve saldırgan tavırlarını, ne de Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın temkinli duruşlarını andırıyor ancak ağrıyan başın ve amnezinin yan etkileri, Arkon'un eylemlerini bölen bu cüretkâr varlığa gözlerini odaklamanı engelliyor. Zeno bakışlarına karşılık veriyor ve seni başıyla selamlıyor. Üzerindeki gölgeler bir anlığına maskenin ifadesini bozarak haylaz bir gülüş ortaya çıkarıyor.{/n}
